text: accamayam (yusuhpaip parri) narceyti kurupavarum vantu, (yusuhputaiya cattaiyai) avar (tantaiyin) mukattil potave, avar ilanta (tan kan) parvaiyai ataintu â€˜â€˜(yusuhp uyirotiruppataip parri) ninkal ariyata varraiyellam allahvin arulaik kontu niccayamaka nan ariven enpataka (munnar) nan unkalukkuk kuravillaiya?'' Enru kettar
